alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Van Buren; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 1:56AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, western Cleburne, northern Faulkner, east central Conway and west central White Counties through 230 AM CST... At 156 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mallet Town, or 12 miles north of Conway, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Greenbrier... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Twin Groves... Catholic Point... Fairbanks... Mallet Town... Whipple... Springfield... Woolly Hollow State Park... Bee Branch... Barney... Brownsville... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Pearson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Van Buren; White
